frameDefinitions: A Protagonist has (or does not have) a Weapon.
An Entity changes, either in its category membership, its situation, or in terms of the quality of an Attribute.
A Stimulus serves to bring about an emotion of mental stimulation in an Experiencer.
In this frame either a Stimulus brings about a particular emotion or experience in the Experiencer or  saliently fails to bring about a particular experience.
A certain Idiosyncrasy belongs to an Entity distinguishing it from other entities.
In the course of history, an Event or Entity is taken to have importance or significance.
frameExamples: Apparently, the suspect is <t>armed</t> with a shotgun.
As soon as Tiffany kissed the frog, Tiffany <t>turned</t> into a frog.
You will not easily find a more <t>absorbing</t> box-set of piano discs.
If you have 32 totally <t>idiosyncratic</t> meanings for a term in a class, everyone will be very confused when they talk! DNI
Throughout the campaign activists have <t>made</t> financial <t>history</t> as one by one major corporations have yielded to protester power
listRoleDefinitions: The destructive device that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> has with them.
The individual that possesses a <fen>Weapon</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> carries a <fen>Weapon</fen>.
The location where a <fen>Protagonist</fen> carries a <fen>Weapon</fen>.
The concrete or abstract entity that undergoes a change.
The type of <fen>Entity</fen> that results from the change.
The category that the <fen>Entity</fen> belongs to before it undergoes the change.
The value of the <fen>Attribute</fen> before the change takes place.
The quality of the <fen>Attribute</fen> that results from the change.
A characteristic of the <fen>Entity</fen> for which a quality can be assigned or determined by calculation, measurement, or observation.

The <fen>Initial_value</fen> and <fen>Final_value</fen> taken together as the range through which the <fen>Entity</fen> changes.

The main faith of the church has <t>changed</t> <fex name='val'>between Orthodox, Protestant and Greek Catholic</fex> several times.
The <fen>Entity</fen>'s situation that results from the change.
The situation that the <fen>Entity</fen> began in.
The time at which the <fen>Entity</fen> undergoes the transformation.
The location that the change takes place.
The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is the person or sentient entity that experiences or feels the emotions.
The <fen>Stimulus</fen> is the person, event, or state of affairs that evokes the emotional response in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Experiencer</fen>  can be described as having said emotion.
The <fen>Stimulus</fen> is the object or event which brings about the emotion in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
An entity or characteristic  belonging to the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The <fen>Entity</fen> that has a certain distinguishing <fen>Idiosyncrasy</fen>.
This role identifies the event which occurs to create history.
This role identifies the entity, concrete or abstract.
This role identifies the time when the event occurs.
This role identifies where the event takes place.
listRoleExamples: How pleasing to see that <fex>Martha</fex> has changed now.
The viccar changed <fex>from a professional clergyman</fex> into an anti-ecclesiastical activist.
At that time, my asthma changed <fex>from very mild</fex> to severe.
Its color changed from red <fex>to blue</fex>.
Test to check if <fex>the color</fex> changes when you place your mouse over the JavaScript image
Tests went from taking three hours <fex>to needing less than one</fex> .
She slowly shifted <fex>from giving him makework</fex> to actually finding he had some skills .
Paul has an idiosyncratic <fex>tendency to go barefoot at all times</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Executive Board of the ECB
